effect_description.STRANGE_STEAM: 60% additional SPECIAL to attacks and shocks

effect_description.SHEER_COLD: +30 SPE_DEF, frozen enemies take 30% additional damage
effect_description.ALLEGRO: Ally team gains +1 ATK and +5% ATK_SPEED
effect_description.PRESTO: Ally team gains +1 ATK, +5% ATK_SPEED and 3 PP
effect_description.DUBIOUS_DISC: Get an artificial item. It is removed when losing the synergy.
effect_description.LINK_CABLE: Gain +8% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item. Get another artificial item.
effect_description.GOOGLE_SPECS: Gain +15% base ATK, AP and max HP as SHIELD per held item. Get another artificial item.
effect_description.HATCHER: Each BABY has [10,LK]% chance to find an Egg.
effect_description.BREEDER: Get at least one Egg after each defeat against a player
effect_description.GOLDEN_EGGS: Each BABY has [4,LK]% chance to find a Golden Egg (max 1 on bench). Golden eggs can be sold for 10 GOLD or give a shiny item when hatched.
effect_description.HYDRATATION: GRASS synergy is healing 5 additional HP per second under the RAIN
effect_description.ETERNAL_LIGHT: Also increase DEF and SPE_DEF by 50% and give RUNE_PROTECT for 8 seconds
effect_description.BERSERK: +100% ATK and move speed, RAGE 5 seconds sooner
effect_description.FLUID: Ally team gains 1% ATK_SPEED and 4 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.SHAPELESS: Ally team gains 3% ATK_SPEED and 8 HP per unique active synergy
effect_description.ETHEREAL: Ally team gains 6% ATK_SPEED and 12 HP per unique active synergy

item_description.FOSSIL_STONE: A fossil of a Pokémon that lived in prehistoric times
item_description.OLD_AMBER: The holder gains the FOSSIL type
item_description.DAWN_STONE: The holder gains the PSYCHIC type
item_description.WATER_STONE: The holder gains the WATER type
item_description.THUNDER_STONE: The holder gains the ELECTRIC type
item_description.FIRE_STONE: The holder gains the FIRE type
item_description.MOON_STONE: The holder gains the FAIRY type
item_description.DUSK_STONE: The holder gains the DARK type
item_description.LEAF_STONE: The holder gains the GRASS type
item_description.ICE_STONE: The holder gains the ICE type
item_description.SOUL_DEW: During combat, the holder gains 10 AP every second
item_description.UPGRADE: Successful attacks grant +5% bonus ATK_SPEED for the rest of combat
item_description.REAPER_CLOTH: The holder spells can critically strike
item_description.POKEMONOMICON: When the holder deals SPECIAL, they BURN the target for 3 seconds
item_description.POWER_LENS: The amount of SPECIAL reduced by SPE_DEF is inflicted back to the attacker
item_description.SHELL_BELL: Holder heals for 33% of all damages inflicted
item_description.AQUA_EGG: The holder gains +50 starting PP and regains 20 PP after casting its ability
item_description.BLUE_ORB: Every third attack dealt unleashes a chain lightning that bounces to the 2 closest enemies, dealing 10 SPECIAL and burning 20 PP
item_description.SCOPE_LENS: Critical hits steal 15 PP from the target.
item_description.STAR_DUST: After casting ability, gain 50% of max PP as SHIELD
item_description.GREEN_ORB: Holder and adjacent allies regain 4% of their max HP every second
item_description.MANA_SCARF: The holder attacks restore 8 additional PP
item_description.SMOKE_BALL: Once below 33% max HP, drop the smoke ball and jump to a cell away. Every adjacent enemy is PARALYSIS for 3 seconds, and the smoke reduce the precision of all Pokémons inside by 50%.
item_description.XRAY_VISION: +50% ATK_SPEED. The holder attacks can no longer miss.
item_description.RAZOR_FANG: +100% CRIT_POWER. Critical hits apply ARMOR_REDUCTION for 4 seconds.
item_description.PROTECTIVE_PADS: Attacks deal double damage against SHIELD. User is protected from recoil damage and retaliation effects.
item_description.CHOICE_SCARF: On hit deal 50% basic attack damage to an adjacent enemy
item_description.PUNCHING_GLOVE: Attacks deal 8 % of target max HP as additional PHYSICAL
item_description.DEFENSIVE_RIBBON: When the holder takes damage, gain 1 stack. Every 2 stacks, the holder gains +1 DEF, +1 ATK and +5% ATK_SPEED (max 20 stacks)
item_description.WONDER_BOX: At the beginning of each battle, WONDER_BOX is replaced by 2 temporary items (max 3 items held)
item_description.CLEANSE_TAG: When combat begins, the holder and all adjacent allies on the same row receive 20% of their respective HP as SHIELD and RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
item_description.FLUFFY_TAIL: Holder is immune to all status alterations
item_description.KINGS_ROCK: +100 SHIELD + 30% HP as SHIELD when combat begins
item_description.SHINY_CHARM: Prevents damage and give PROTECT for 2 seconds the first time the holders gets below 30% HP
item_description.GRACIDEA_FLOWER: When combat begins, the holder and adjacent allies in the same row gain +20 % ATK_SPEED
item_description.FLAME_ORB: Holder is burned during the entire fight but increase its base ATK by 100%
item_description.ASSAULT_VEST: +20 SPE_DEF. Reduce BURN and POISONNED damage by 50%
item_description.AMULET_COIN: +1 GOLD each time the holder knocks down an opponent
item_description.POKE_DOLL: Reduce all incoming PHYSICAL and SPECIAL by 30%
item_description.RED_ORB: 25% of attack damage is dealt as TRUE
item_description.MAX_REVIVE: Give RESURECTION, preventing the holder first KO and restoring to max HP
item_description.ROCKY_HELMET: +12 DEF. Negates critical bonus damage from incoming critical hits.
item_description.AGUAV_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, restore to max HP and get CONFUSION for 3 seconds
item_description.APICOT_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 20 SPE_DEF
item_description.ASPEAR_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being FREEZE, heal 20 HP and give +15% ATK_SPEED and immunity to FREEZE for the rest of the fight
item_description.BABIRI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after receiving a critical hit, heal 20 HP and gain PROTECT for 2 seconds
item_description.CHERI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being PARALYSIS, heal 20 HP and give +10 ATK and immunity to PARALYSIS for the rest of the fight
item_description.CHESTO_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being SLEEP, heal 20 HP and give +15 AP and immunity to SLEEP for the rest of the fight
item_description.GANLON_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 20 DEF
item_description.JABOCA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and cast $t(ability.SPIKE_ARMOR) for 10 seconds
item_description.LANSAT_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 50% CRIT_CHANCE
item_description.LEPPA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after casting ability, heal 20 HP and gain 50 PP once
item_description.LIECHI_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 15 ATK
item_description.LUM_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP, clear negative status and get RUNE_PROTECT for 5 seconds
item_description.ORAN_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 80 SHIELD
item_description.PECHA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being POISONNED, heal 50 HP and give immunity to POISONNED for the rest of the fight
item_description.PERSIM_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being CONFUSION, heal 20 HP and give 10 SPE_DEF and immunity to CONFUSION for the rest of the fight
item_description.PETAYA_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 80 AP
item_description.RAWST_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP or after being BURN, heal 20 HP and give 10 DEF and immunity to BURN for the rest of the fight
item_description.ROWAP_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and cast $t(ability.MAGIC_BOUNCE) for 10 seconds
item_description.SALAC_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 20 HP and gain 50% ATK_SPEED
item_description.SITRUS_BERRY: Consumed once below 50% HP, heal 30 HP and increase all healing received by 50%
item_description.COMFEY: Wears $t(pkm.COMFEY) and get its ability and all its stats
item_description.ELECTIRIZER: Every third attack burns 15 PP of the target and inflicts PARALYSIS for 2 seconds
item_description.MAGMARIZER: Every successful attack increase ATK by 1 and inflicts BURN for 2 seconds
item_description.TOXIC_ORB: Gives POISON synergy. Holder is POISONNED but increase its ATK by 100%
item_description.METRONOME: Gives SOUND synergy. Every second, the holder gains 5 PP
item_description.SWIFT_WING: Gives FLYING synergy. Gain 10% chance to dodge attacks.
item_description.BIG_NUGGET: Gives GROUND synergy. If the holder is alive after 15 seconds and gets 5 stacks of GROUND, gain 3 GOLD.
item_description.INCENSE: Each Pokémon in shop has an additional 5% chance to share a common synergy with the holder.
item_description.EXP_SHARE: Get the best ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF values of adjacent allies in the same row
item_description.POKERUS_VIAL: Infects the holder with POKERUS, gaining 1 ATK and 10 AP every 2 seconds and transmitting to allies
item_description.ROTOM_PHONE: Gives GHOST synergy. Summons Rotom Drone near the holder
item_description.SILK_SCARF: Gives NORMAL synergy and increase SHIELD from all sources by 30%
item_description.TINY_MUSHROOM: Gives BUG synergy but reduce max HP by 50%
item_description.METEORITE: A meteorite that seems to interact with Deoxys. It continues to give off a faint glow and is slightly warm to the touch.
item_description.BERRY_JUICE: Consumed once below 50% HP, restore to max HP
item_description.TRASH: The remains of an artificial item. It does nothing
item_description.OLD_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch common and uncommon WATER Pokémons as well as Magikarp.
item_description.GOOD_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch rare WATER Pokémons and Feebas.
item_description.SUPER_ROD: After each PvP round, fish a Pokémon that is then added to a free slot on your bench. Can catch epic WATER Pokémons and Wishiwashi.
item_description.DYNAMAX_BAND: At the start of the fight, raise max HP by 250%.
item_description.SHINY_STONE: Gives +2 to LIGHT synergy and spawn a second light spot on the holder's cell
item_description.RARE_CANDY: Immediately make a Pokémon evolve. Can only be given to non-fully evolved Pokémon, and reduce its sell price to its previous tier.
item_description.EVIOLITE: Holder gets a bunch of stats, but can no longer evolve. Can only be given to non-fully evolved Pokémon.
item_description.WHITE_FLUTE: Spawn 3 WILD Pokémons around the holder at the start of the fight. Rarity and tier increase with stage level.
item_description.GOLD_BOTTLE_CAP: +1% CRIT_CHANCE and CRIT_POWER per GOLD you have. Gain 1 GOLD per KO, and a 5 GOLD jackpot if eliminating the last enemy.
item_description.ABSORB_BULB: All the damage reduction is absorbed by the bulb. Once under 50% HP, bulb explodes, dealing all damage absorbed to adjacent enemy units as SPECIAL.
item_description.SACRED_ASH: Gives RESURECTION. After resurecting, up to 3 allies KO are resurected as well, but without items.
item_description.COMET_SHARD: Starts the round by diving like a comet on an enemy at the opposite side of the board, dealing 300% ATK as SPECIAL to target and adjacent enemies, while gaining PROTECT for 3 seconds.
item_description.REPEAT_BALL: Every 2 shop rerolls, gain +1% AP and find a mon in shop that shares a synergy with the holder. Their rarity increases with the total number of shop refreshes done during the game.
item_description.DAMP_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards RAIN. Under RAIN, your team gains +2 PP per second.
item_description.ICY_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SNOW. Under SNOW, your team recovers from FREEZE 20% faster and have 5% additional chance to FREEZE their opponents with their attacks.
item_description.HEAT_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SUN. Under SUN, your team takes 20% less damage from BURN and have 5% additional chance to BURN their opponents with their attacks.
item_description.SMOOTH_ROCK: Counts for 3 towards SANDSTORM. Under SANDSTORM, your team takes 20% less sandstorm damage and gain 1% ATK_SPEED every second.
item_description.BLACK_AUGURITE: Counts for 3 towards NIGHT. Under NIGHT, your team gains 5% CRIT_CHANCE and take 5% less critical damage.
item_description.ELECTRIC_QUARTZ: Counts for 3 towards STORM. Under STORM, your team gains 50 SHIELD when struck by lightning and recovers from PARALYSIS 20% faster.
item_description.FLOAT_STONE: Counts for 3 towards WINDY. Under WINDY, your team gains 5% additional ATK_SPEED.
item_description.MIST_STONE: Counts for 3 towards MISTY. Under MISTY, your team gains 2 SPE_DEF.
item_description.BLOOD_STONE: Counts for 3 towards BLOODMOON. Under BLOODMOON, your team gets 30% of incoming healing as SHIELD when WOUND, and heal for 20% of damage dealt if target is WOUND.
item_description.SMELLY_CLAY: Counts for 3 towards SMOG. Under SMOG, your team gains 5% accuracy and has 10% less chance to get POISONNED.
item_description.FIRE_SHARD: Sacrifice 3 player HP to give permanently +3 ATK to a FIRE Pokémon. Immediately consumed when given.
item_description.TEAL_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the FLORA type during battle.
item_description.WELLSPRING_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the AQUATIC type during battle.
item_description.HEARTHFLAME_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the FIRE type during battle.
item_description.CORNERSTONE_MASK: This carved wooden mask is adorned with crystals, grants 50 SHIELD and allows Ogerpon to wield the ROCK type during battle.

passive_description.TYROGUE:
Will choose a combat discipline based on the first item given:
CHARCOAL MAGNET: $t(pkm.HITMONLEE)
HEART_SCALE NEVER_MELT_ICE: $t(pkm.HITMONCHAN)
Others: $t(pkm.HITMONTOP)
passive_description.PROTEAN2: The Pokémon acquires the typing of the 2 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.PROTEAN3: The Pokémon acquires the typing of the 3 highest synergies on the team
passive_description.CASTFORM: Castform changes its form and the weather to SUN, RAIN or SNOW depending on your dominant synergy between FIRE WATER ICE
passive_description.PHIONE: Phione is looking for an AQUA_EGG
passive_description.SCYTHER: $t(pkm.SCYTHER) is looking for a METAL_COAT or a BLACK_AUGURITE
passive_description.PRIMAL: Legend has it that you could unleash the ancient powers of these Pokémons
passive_description.WONDER_GUARD: Blocks 20 damage on every hit received
passive_description.ELECTRIC_TERRAIN: Give ELECTRIC_FIELD to your ELECTRIC Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.GRASSY_TERRAIN: Give GRASS_FIELD to your GRASS Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.MISTY_TERRAIN: Give FAIRY_FIELD to your FAIRY Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.PSYCHIC_TERRAIN: Give PSYCHIC_FIELD to your Psychic Pokemon, boosting their damage by 20%
passive_description.EEVEE: Eevee can evolve into one of the 8 Eeveelutions when given a synergy stone
passive_description.TYPE_NULL: $t(pkm.TYPE_NULL) can evolve into $t(pkm.SILVALLY) when given a synergy item
passive_description.RKS_SYSTEM: RKS system: $t(pkm.SILVALLY) can change its synergy items at any time. Place it on bench to drop synergy items.
passive_description.SUDOWOODO:
Pretends to be a tree and does not attack but gain [2,4] ATK per second instead (stackable).
Starts attacking when PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.WOBBUFFET: Does not move or attack until PP bar is full, cannot be SILENCE or lose PP until then.
passive_description.DITTO: Ditto can transform to create a 1 STAR copy of one of your Pokémons you drop it over (not Unique, Legendary or Hatch)
passive_description.EGG: You can feel something moving inside
passive_description.HATCH: Hatched Pokémons evolve automatically after 5 stages
passive_description.SYNCHRO: If the Pokémon is affected by POISONNED, BURN, WOUND or SILENCE, the enemy caster will suffer the same negative status
passive_description.TADPOLE: Poliwhirl will evolve into Poliwrath if placed on the frontlane, Politoed otherwise
passive_description.BIVALVE: Clamperl will evolve into Huntail if placed on the frontlane, Gorebyss otherwise
passive_description.LUGIA: Lugia changes weather to WINDY and looks for a DUSK_STONE
passive_description.LANDORUS: Change weather to SANDSTORM or WINDY based on your dominant synergy between GROUND and FLYING
passive_description.THUNDURUS: Change weather to STORM or WINDY based on your dominant synergy between ELECTRIC and FLYING
passive_description.TORNADUS: Change weather to WINDY or SNOW based on your dominant synergy between FLYING and ICE
passive_description.ENAMORUS: Change weather to MISTY or WINDY based on your dominant synergy between FAIRY and FLYING
passive_description.HYDRATATION: GRASS synergy is healing 5 additional HP per second under the RAIN
passive_description.SHARED_VISION: Shared vision: all Pokemon with shared vision will attack the same target, if at range
passive_description.WATER_SPRING: Whenever an enemy uses their ability, gain 5 PP
passive_description.GIRATINA: Giratina switches between its Altered Forme and Origin Forme depending on its position on the board
passive_description.MELOETTA: Meloetta switches between its Pirouette Forme and Aria Forme depending on its position on the board
passive_description.UNOWN: Unown cannot hold items and vanish after one fight or after casting their ability
passive_description.GLIGAR: Gligar is looking for a RAZOR_FANG. If the Pokémon is POISONNED, it will gain HP instead of taking damage
passive_description.POISON_HEAL: If the Pokémon is POISONNED, it will gain HP instead of taking damage
passive_description.GRIM_NEIGH: When the Pokémon knocks out an enemy, it emits a terrifying whinny sound that increases its AP by 30
passive_description.SHAYMIN: Shaymin is looking for a GRACIDEA_FLOWER
passive_description.BEAST_BOOST_ATK: Upon kill, the Pokémon gains 5 ATK
passive_description.BEAST_BOOST_AP: Upon kill, the Pokémon gains 10 AP
passive_description.CHINGLING: Chingling is looking for a STAR_DUST
passive_description.CHIMECHO: Resonates to the sounds of adjacent allies, which doubles their cry while Chimecho is alive
passive_description.SURGE_SURFER: The surge surfer gets +30% ATK_SPEED in ELECTRIC_FIELD or PSYCHIC_FIELD
passive_description.MEGA_LAUNCHER: This Pokémon ability emits 3 SOUND cries instead of one
passive_description.DRY_SKIN: Heals 8 HP per second under RAIN. Gains 25% dodge chance under SANDSTORM. Gains 50 AP under SUN
passive_description.SPOT_PANDA: The Pokémon is immune to CONFUSION and deals [100,SP]% additional SPECIAL to Pokémons CONFUSION
passive_description.GUTS: The Pokémon gains 5 ATK as long as it is BURN or POISONNED
passive_description.STENCH: Leaves behind a stinking cloud that POISONNED any unit that breathes it
passive_description.PORYGON: Porygon2 is looking for an UPGRADE
passive_description.MOXIE: Every time an enemy Pokémon is KO, it gains ATK equal to its stars
passive_description.ILLUMISE_VOLBEAT: Illumise and Volbeat gain 5 PP per second for each other member of their species alive on the board
passive_description.PRISM: Necrozma switches between its Ultra form and Normal form depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.BLOSSOM: Cherrim switches between its Sunlight form and Normal form depending on its exposure to LIGHT
passive_description.SPECIAL_ATTACK: Basic attacks deal SPECIAL and scale with AP
passive_description.NINCADA: After evolving, get Shedinja as well if you have a free space on your bench
passive_description.FAMILY: The Pokémon grows with time (turn 15 and turn 20)
passive_description.SAND_STREAM: The Pokémon count as 3 for SANDSTORM
passive_description.DRIZZLE: The Pokémon count as 3 for RAIN
passive_description.WIND_POWER: The Pokémon count as 3 for STORM
passive_description.HARVEST: At the start of each fight, add a random berry to Pokémon items. If full, berry is added to player items instead.
passive_description.GLUTTON: Permanently gains 20 max HP every time it eats a berry
passive_description.COMFEY: Comfey cannot hold items. At the start of the fight, the nearest ally with a free item slot wears Comfey and gains all its stats. Comfey casts it's ability at the same time as it's holder. When its holder is KO, Comfey fights on its own.
passive_description.HISUIAN_TYPHLOSION: The Pokémon inflicts 20% extra damage on a BURN or SILENCE target
passive_description.PICKUP: The Pokémon will start with a random item if it's not holding anything
passive_description.CORSOLA: $t(pkm.CORSOLA) evolves into $t(pkm.GALAR_CORSOLA) after being KO once
passive_description.CELEBI: The player regains 1 HP every time $t(pkm.CELEBI) casts $t(ability.TIME_TRAVEL).
passive_description.GHOLDENGO: At the start of each fight, if the player has 50 GOLD or more, $t(pkm.GHOLDENGO) gains RUNE_PROTECT for the entire fight
passive_description.METEOR:
$t(pkm.MINIOR) alternates between its meteor and core forms. The meteor form grants [5,SP]% ATK_SPEED per attack.
 Core form attacks apply additional effects on target and adjacent enemies:
 Blue: Deals [100,SP]% SPECIAL
 Red: Deals [150,SP]% PHYSICAL
 Orange: Deals [50,SP]% TRUE
 Green: heals adjacent allies for [100,SP]% of damage dealt
passive_description.MIMIKYU: When hit under 50% HP, Mimikyu changes into its Busted Form, gaining 10 ATK and PROTECT for 2 seconds
passive_description.MIMIKYU_BUSTED: Its neck is broken. Mimikyu will never forget the person who damaged its rag for as long as it is still alive.
passive_description.HUNGER_SWITCH:
$t(pkm.MORPEKO) alternates between its normal and hangry forms.
 Normal form triple attacks inflicts PARALYSIS for 2 seconds.
 Hangry form triple attacks inflicts WOUND for 4 seconds.
passive_description.WATER_BUBBLE: The Pokémon is immune to BURN
passive_description.LYCANROC: $t(pkm.LYCANROC_DUSK) turns into night form during NIGHT and day form during SUN
passive_description.COSMOG: $t(pkm.COSMOG) is feeding with the energy of the stars. Gain 10 permanent max HP every time you evolve a unit. Evolve after 10 times.
passive_description.COSMOEM: $t(pkm.COSMOEM) is feeding with the energy of the stars. Gain 10 permanent max HP every time you evolve a unit. Evolve after 10 times into $t(pkm.SOLGALEO) if in the light spot, or $t(pkm.LUNALA) instead.
passive_description.SOUL_HEART: Every time the caster gets a KO, gain 10 AP and 10 PP
passive_description.ALIEN_DNA: $t(pkm.DEOXYS) reacts to METEORITE by changing shape
passive_description.BERRY_EATER: When the Pokémon attacks a target, he steals all its berries and eats them
passive_description.TOXIC_BOOST: The Pokémon takes 50% less poison damage and gains 10 ATK as long as it is POISONNED
passive_description.GUZZLORD: Guzzlord is too heavy and can't jump
passive_description.ENVIRONMENTAL_ADAPTATION: This Pokémon adapted its synergies to its region
passive_description.MOTHIM: Mothim gets the synergies of your regional Burmy form
passive_description.PSYDUCK: Has [10,LK]% chance to get CONFUSION when taking a hit. Every time it gets CONFUSION, gain 100 AP
passive_description.RECYCLE: Feed it with berries to gain 10 HP, or with basic components for 25 HP + item stats. Feed it with artificial items to gain 50 HP + item stats, and get TRASH in return
passive_description.DREAM_CATCHER: If its target is SLEEP, holder attacks give 10 SHIELD to the 3 allies closest to it
passive_description.SLOW_START: Starts at 0.5 ATK_SPEED. After first ability cast, gains 30% ATK_SPEED and 10 ATK
passive_description.STONJOURNER: Does not move or attack until PP bar is full. Its power spot gives 50 AP to all adjacent allies at the start of the fight
passive_description.POISON_PIN: Poipole will evolve into Naganadel after stacking 200 HP
passive_description.PYUKUMUKU: When this pokemon is KO, it explodes dealing [100,SP] SPECIAL to adjacent enemies.
passive_description.LUVDISC: The allies on its left and on its right fall in love, and share the best value of their respective ATK, AP, DEF and SPE_DEF at the start of the fight
passive_description.MANTYKE: When Mantyke is on board, gain 30% chance to fish a Remoraid with your fishing rod. Evolves into Mantine if a Remoraid is next to it.
passive_description.MANTINE: When Mantine is on board, gain 30% chance to fish a Remoraid with your fishing rod.
passive_description.SABLEYE: Sableye is looking for a RED_ORB
passive_description.MEGA_SABLEYE: Mega Sableye gains RUNE_PROTECT for the entire fight
passive_description.MELMETAL: Melmetal can't gain ATK_SPEED. Bonus ATK_SPEED is converted into ATK (10% ATK_SPEED: 3 ATK)
passive_description.SKARMORY: At the start of the fight, Skarmory scatters spikes around the field. The spikes deal 10 TRUE per second and ARMOR_REDUCTION to Pokémons that walk on it, if not FLYING.
passive_description.DURANT: Durant basic attacks deals 1 extra TRUE for each BUG ally on your board
passive_description.OGERPON_TEAL:
Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance 
 Upon casting, restores [20,SP] HP to adjacent allies
passive_description.OGERPON_WELLSPRING:
Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance 
 Upon casting, gives 10 PP to adjacent allies
passive_description.OGERPON_HEARTHFLAME:
Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance 
 Upon casting, BURN adjacent enemies for 2 seconds
passive_description.OGERPON_CORNERSTONE:
Ogerpon can wear TEAL_MASK, HEARTHFLAME_MASK, WELLSPRING_MASK and CORNERSTONE_MASK to change its appearance 
 Upon casting, FLINCH adajcent enemies for 5 seconds
passive_description.VICTINI: Increases the accuracy of the team. Allies can no longer miss their attacks.
passive_description.AEGISLASH: Alternates between Shield Forme and Blade Forme when casting ability
passive_description.DARMANITAN: When below 30% HP, jumps to a safe place and turns into Zen Mode.
passive_description.DARMANITAN_ZEN: Can no longer move or attack, but regain [15,SP] HP per second. Transforms back into Standard Mode when fully healed.
passive_description.GOOD_LUCK: Increase the LUCK of all allies by 20%
passive_description.PRIMEAPE: Primeape becomes angrier when KO, gaining 1 permanent ATK. After Primeape is knocked out 10 times, evolves into Annihilape.

stat_description.ATK: Damage inflicted on each basic attack
stat_description.ATK_SPEED: Number of attacks per second. Maximum 2.5.
stat_description.CRIT_CHANCE: Critical hits deal 2x more damage. Abilities cannot crit by default. Crit chance over 100% is converted to Crit power.
stat_description.CRIT_POWER: Multiplier for critical hits damage, healing and buffs
stat_description.HP: Pokémon is knocked out when it no longer has Health Points
stat_description.MAX_PP: Amount of PP required to cast ability. Pokemons receive PP over time (10 per second), when attacking (5 per attack) and when receiving damage (10% of incoming damage)
stat_description.AP: Increase SPECIAL and ability effects in various ways.
stat_description.SHIELD: Temporary health points, cannot be healed.
stat_description.LUCK: Multiplier for random draws, influences all effects involving chance.

status_description.BURN: Deals 5% of max HP as TRUE every second. Reduce healing by 50%.
status_description.SILENCE: Prevents casting abilities and gaining PP
status_description.FATIGUE: Reduce PP gain from all sources by 50%
status_description.POISONNED: Deals 5% of max HP per stack as TRUE every second. Can stack up to 3 times by default.
status_description.PROTECT: Protects from any source of damage, but prevents healing and PP gain. Enemies will avoid targeting a protected unit.
status_description.SLEEP: Prevents moving, dodging or attacking. Receiving attacks reduces the duration of the effect.
status_description.CONFUSION: Force to change target all the time and sometimes deal damage to itself
status_description.RAGE: Double damage and speed, half shield, healing, freeze and sleep durations, lose PROTECT. All units become RAGE after 35 seconds of fight.
status_description.RESURECTION: Prevents KO once, restoring to max HP
status_description.PARALYSIS: Reduce ATK_SPEED and move speed by 40%, prevents dodging attacks
status_description.POKERUS: Every 2 seconds, gain 1 ATK and 10 AP before infecting 2 adjacent allies with POKERUS
status_description.CHARM: Prevents attacking the target and forces to get closer to it
status_description.CURSE: KOs the cursed Pokémon after some time
status_description.LOCKED: Prevents moving and sets RANGE to 1

synergy_description.NORMAL: NORMAL Pokémons and their adjacent allies gain SHIELD when combat starts
synergy_description.GRASS: GRASS Pokémons heal and produce berries over time
synergy_description.FIRE: FIRE Pokémons gain ATK after every hit and have a chance to BURN their enemies
synergy_description.WATER: WATER Pokémons generate more PP and can be fished with a rod
synergy_description.ELECTRIC: ELECTRIC Pokémons basic attacks can trigger two additional attacks
synergy_description.FIGHTING: FIGHTING Pokémons block a flat amount of damage on every hit received. After 10 hits blocked, throw the target away, destroying its SHIELD
synergy_description.PSYCHIC: PSYCHIC Pokémons gain additional AP and attract Unowns
synergy_description.DARK: DARK Pokémons critical hits are more powerful and more frequent. Melee Dark Pokémons jump to the farthest target reachable
synergy_description.STEEL: STEEL Pokémons deal a percentage of their damage as TRUE
synergy_description.GROUND: GROUND Pokémons gain bonus ATK, DEF and SPE_DEF every 3 seconds.
synergy_description.POISON: POISON Pokémons have a chance to POISONNED their target for 4 seconds with their basic attacks. Poison inflicts TRUE over time
synergy_description.DRAGON: DRAGON amplify synergies and gains more stats when fully evolved.
synergy_description.FIELD: When a FIELD Pokémon is KO, all the other FIELD Pokémons are healed and gain ATK_SPEED
synergy_description.MONSTER: MONSTER Pokémons can FLINCH their opponents for 3 seconds on attack. Every time they get a KO, they gain stats, heal and grow in size.
synergy_description.HUMAN: HUMAN Pokémons seek to stay on their feet. All your team heals for a percentage of the damage they deal with attacks and abilities
synergy_description.AQUATIC: AQUATIC Pokémons reduce the duration of status afflictions for all your team. After 8 seconds, a tidal wave cleans up negative status and field effects, heal your AQUATIC allies and knock back and damage enemies.
synergy_description.BUG: At the start of the combat, your strongest BUG Pokémons are cloned
synergy_description.FLYING: FLYING Pokémons fly away when they fell under a certain amount of HP, unless PARALYSIS, FREEZE or SLEEP
synergy_description.FLORA: When the first FLORA Pokémon is KO, a flower blossoms. It receives one random item from each FLORA ally KO
synergy_description.ROCK: ROCK Pokémons gain DEF, better resist to critical damage and can adapt to weather.
synergy_description.GHOST: GHOST Pokémons have 20% chance to dodge attacks and SILENCE on hit, and apply various curses on opponents
synergy_description.FAIRY: FAIRY Pokémons deal additional SPECIAL with their attacks and trigger shocks when critically hit, retaliating for 30% of incoming damage
synergy_description.ICE: ICE Pokémons have a chance to FREEZE the enemy for 2 seconds after a hit and give SPE_DEF to the whole team
synergy_description.FOSSIL: On their first KO, FOSSIL Pokémons come back to life with increased ATK
synergy_description.SOUND: SOUND Pokémons emit a cry when they use their abilities, waking up allies asleep and giving them bonus stats
synergy_description.ARTIFICIAL: ARTIFICIAL Pokémons give unique items and gain ATK, AP and SHIELD when holding items
synergy_description.BABY: BABY have a chance to bring you Pokemon Eggs to comfort you after a defeat. Chance stacks with losing streaks.{{additionalInfo}}
synergy_description.LIGHT: LIGHT reveal a spotlight on the battlefield. The unit standing in the spotlight at the start of combat gains unique bonuses
synergy_description.WILD: WILD Pokémons get increased ATK, move faster, and have 25% chance to WOUND their target. For each WILD Pokémon STAR on board, get +1% chance to find WILD in your shops + 5% chance during PvE rounds{{additionalInfo}}
synergy_description.WILD_ADDITIONAL: Current chance to find a WILD pokemon: {{wildChance}}%
synergy_description.AMORPHOUS: AMORPHOUS Pokémons are extremely flexible and lack their own shape. Your team gains HP and ATK_SPEED by activating a wide variety of synergies.

faq.official_game_answer: No, this is a fan game; made by fans, for fans. All rights/credits to Pokemon Company.
faq.how_pokemon_evolve_answer: You need 3 copies of the same Pokémon to get the evolution. The 3 Pokémons will merge to give the evolved Pokémon. Hatch Pokemon that come from eggs evolve automatically with time every 5 stages.
faq.income_answer: You get 5 gold per round whether you draw, win or lose. You get 1 bonus income per 10 gold saved. A maximum of 5 bonus income accrued at 50 saved gold. You get 1 bonus gold if you win. If you win multiple times, you will also gain extra gold; one bonus gold for every victory/defeat, up to 5 bonus gold for 5 streak wins / 5 streak defeat. Wins/Defeats against PVE are not taken into account.
faq.collection: What is the purpose of the collection/booster ?
faq.collection_answer: When opening boosters, you get Pokémon shards. Those shards are specific to every Pokémon. In the collection tab, you can buy Pokémon emotions with those shards. You can see Pokémon emotions as a detailed customization. When selecting an emotion Pokémon portrait, the Pokémon will appear everywhere with the same emotion portrait that you have selected. Eveyone will see the emotion that you picked for this Pokémon. Moreover, if you have selected a shiny emotion, the Pokémon will appear shiny to everyone else.
faq.avatars: How do I get new avatars ?
faq.avatars_answer: When buying a Pokémon emotion, it will be available in your profile avatar list.
faq.boosters_answer: You gain boosters each time you level up.
faq.level_answer: You gain experience each time you finish a game. If you finish first, you'll get 700 xp, if you finish last, you'll get 100 xp.
faq.sprite: It seems some sprites are missing ?
faq.sprite_answer2: If you want the missing sprites to be added, please consider donating to Pokémon autochess. Every donation will be used to pay spriters to make sprites for everyone.
faq.sprite_answer1: Sprites of Pokémon auto chess are based on
faq.mythical: How do I get unique / legendary Pokémons ?
faq.mythical_answer: On stages 10 and 20, portals with synergy symbols will appear. Entering a portal will give the opportunity to select one of six powerful Pokemon, with each symbol guaranteeing a synergy of one of the Pokemon. If no portal is entered, all Pokemon options will be entirely random. Symbols are determined by the synergy levels reached by each remaining player, with 4 symbols per player chosen randomly from a pool of one symbol per each of their reached synergy levels.
faq.ditto_answer: Ditto creates a plain copy of the unit you hover and drop it over. Each Pokémon in shop has a 0.5% chance to be a Ditto at every roll. You can't copy unique and hatch Pokémon.
faq.items_answer: You can gain item components by winning PvE rounds or picking one in an item carousel. You can combine two item components to create a powerful tier 2 item. Every Pokémon can hold up to 3 items. The crafting list of all items is available in the wiki, in the items section.
faq.bots_answer: Bots are created by other players. Bots are theme-based, a mewtwo bot will always have an mewtwo in its team at a certain time in the game. Bots have a list of predefined teams at each stage.
faq.create_bot: Can i create my own bot ?
faq.create_bot_answer: Sure. You'll need to be at least level 20 to unlock the Bot Builder gadget. You can use it to create and submit your bot, it will be sent in the #bot-creation channel on Discord for a review by the bot reviewers team.
faq.elo: How does the elo system work ?
faq.elo_answer: The elo system in Pokemon Auto Chess works the same as in other elo based games like Chess, Lol, Starcraft etc... To gain elo points, you need to beat other players. The higher your opponent's elo, the more elo you will gain by defeating him, and vice versa. If you don't play for 10 days, your elo will start to decay (-10 elo/day).
faq.missing_points: I didn't get elo points in my last game, why ?
faq.missing_points_answer: The game needs to be finished in order to win/lose elo points. If someone is still in game, you need to wait. Bots do not give elo, only human players are accounted for elo rating. It is also possible that the game had elo disabled ("Just for fun" mode)
faq.damage: What are the special damages and physical damages ?
faq.damage_answer: Auto attacks mostly deal Physical damage, while Abilities mostly deal Special damage. Some abilities however can deal true damage or physical damage.
faq.defense: Can you tell me how defense works? Is it flat damage reduction?
faq.defense_answer: Same system as League of Legends: damage: atk / (1+(0.1*def)). Defense works for physical damage, special defense for special damage
faq.shiny: How do you get shiny Pokémons ?
faq.shiny_answer: You get experience points by playing games. With enough experience, you level up and get a booster pack. Each booster pack gives shards for random Pokémon. Use these shards to purchase the shiny emotes of a Pokémon in the Collection page, then you will get that one Pokémon as a shiny ingame.
faq.support: How can i support the game ?
faq.mobile: Will there be a mobile version one day ?
faq.code: What language/library is used to code the game ?
faq.code_answer: TypeScript, Phaser, Colyseus. If you want to contribute

wiki.data_description: Various data about the game for the geeks
wiki.tiers_by_level_description: The odds of getting a certain rarity of Pokémon in your shop changes with your player level. The higher the level, the higher the rarity and the cost in the shop.
wiki.experience_by_rank_description: You gain experience points at the end of each game based on your final rank. Every 1000 XP, you level up and gain one booster.
wiki.booster_rarity_probability_description: The chances to find a Pokémon in a booster pack depends on its rarity.
wiki.ditto_rate: Chance to find Ditto in shop
wiki.kecleon_rate: Chance to find Kecleon in stage 10 propositions
wiki.arceus_rate: Chance to find Arceus in stage 20 propositions
wiki.fishing_rarity_rate_description: The quality of the rod you use to fish influences the rarity of the Pokémon you can catch.
wiki.round_damage_calculation_description: The damage inflicted to player after losing a round is computed like this: Round damage = (stage level / 2) + (number of opponents alive) ; rounded up, clones/spawns do not count
wiki.pool_size_per_category_description: The pokemons you find in shops are taken from a pool shared by all players. The number of specimens of each Pokémon in the pool depends on its rarity and its number of evolution stages.
